org.springframework.web.reactive.result.view.freemarker

类 FreeMarkerViewResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.view.ViewResolverSupport
      • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.view.UrlBasedViewResolver
        • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.view.freemarker.FreeMarkerViewResolver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.core.Ordered, ViewResolver

    public class FreeMarkerViewResolver
extends UrlBasedViewResolver
    A ViewResolver for resolving FreeMarkerView instances, i.e. FreeMarker templates and custom subclasses of it.

    The view class for all views generated by this resolver can be specified via the "viewClass" property. See UrlBasedViewResolver for details.

    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

        public FreeMarkerViewResolver(String prefix,

        参数:
